title: What are some good Snily fanfictions? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m rather fond of this: https://www.fanfiction.net/s/7404358/1/The-White-Road It’s not Snape/Lily in the sense you’re probably thinking of. It’s actually a Snarry, in which Harry and Sev become lovers. But Lily is watching from the afterlife. Initially she is angry and still hates Sev but it gradually gets to the point where she’s no longer sure which of the two she’s more jealous over. It’s *extremely* well written.
